name: MSU 2D shooter Project Final Submission
description:
Created by Ethan Powell utilizing the Unity Game Engine and sprite creation in Pixilart.com 

Final Submission for the MSU 2D Shooter Project Submission

  • Designed and created 4 different levels which drive a story forward
  • Created/drew all game elements (Includes player, enemies, their projectiles, barriers, backgrounds, UI screens, buttons, menu animations, character animations, projectile animations, etc.)
  • Created new animations for all game elements if applicable
  • modified the main menu to be more interesting
  • altered all game audio to match theme and projectiles
  • Created a special boss with a new set of health, different attack pattern, and projectile density, projectile speed, and fire rate
  • altered game element health and damage of projectiles for better balancing
  • Created a mini map in the bottom right corner and moved the score display to the bottom left to clear up player visual
  • created new transitions between levels to assist in telling a light story
  • added a comprehensive instructions page to the main menu 
  • added special death screens per level
  • altered the in-game pause menu to better match the theme
  • adjusted the level select screen to be more visually pleasing
